nodes.text: Jike was a hot rock planet with no moons that occupied the closest orbital position to the star Asar. It was located within the Ilum system, a part of the 7G sector that was situated within the galaxy's Unknown Regions.
Jike was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the Ilum system, and therefore Jike, in grid square G-7.
